vm_cloud_server.`os_info`, vm_cloud_server.`remark`, vm_cloud_server.`network`, vm_cloud_server.`vpc_id`, vm_cloud_server.`subnet_id`, vm_cloud_server.`network_interface_id`, vm_cloud_server.`management_ipv6`, vm_cloud_server.`remote_ipv6`, vm_cloud_server.`local_ipv6`, vm_cloud_server.`ip_type`, vm_cloud_server.`snap_shot`, vm_cloud_server.`create_time`,
